mapper.select: SELECT c.id as id, content, time, updated_time, article_id, c.username as username, m.profile_photo as profile_photo FROM comment as c LEFT JOIN member as m on c.username=m.username WHERE article_id=#{article_id}
SELECT c.id as id, content, time, updated_time, article_id, c.username as username FROM comment as c LEFT JOIN comment_vote as v ON c.id = v.comment_id WHERE article_id=#{article_id} and id=#{id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment(content, time, updated_time, article_id, username) VALUES (#{content}, now(), now(), #{article_id}, #{username})
